title: A Good ReadME Template
description: A template to make good README.md

variables.label: Project Description
variables.name: projectDescription
variables.defaultValue:
One Paragraph of the project description

Initially appeared on
[gist](https://gist.github.com/PurpleBooth/109311bb0361f32d87a2). But the page cannot open anymore so that is why I have moved it here.

functions.name: Getting Started
functions.description: A section to describe how to get started with the project

variables.label: Getting Started Description
variables.name: gettingStartedDescription
variables.defaultValue:
These instructions will give you a copy of the project up and running on
your local machine for development and testing purposes. See deployment
for notes on deploying the project on a live system.

functions.name: Prerequisites
functions.description: A section to describe the prerequisites for the project

variables.label: Prerequisites Description
variables.name: prerequisitesDescription
variables.defaultValue:
Requirements for the software and other tools to build, test and push 
- [Example 1](https://www.example.com)
- [Example 2](https://www.example.com)

functions.name: Installation
functions.description: A section to describe how to install the project

variables.label: Installation Description
variables.name: installationDescription
variables.defaultValue:
A step by step series of examples that tell you how to get a development
environment running

Say what the step will be

    Give the example

And repeat

    until finished

End with an example of getting some data out of the system or using it
for a little demo

functions.name: Running The Tests
functions.description: A section to describe how to run the tests for the project

variables.label: Running The Tests Description
variables.name: runningTheTestsDescription
variables.defaultValue:
Explain how to run the automated tests for this system

### Sample Tests

Explain what these tests test and why

    Give an example

### Style test

Checks if the best practices and the right coding style has been used.

    Give an example

functions.name: Deployment
functions.description: A section to describe how to deploy the project

variables.label: Deployment Description
variables.name: deploymentDescription
variables.defaultValue: Add additional notes to deploy this on a live system

functions.name: Built With
functions.description: A section to describe what the project was built with

variables.label: Built With Description
variables.name: builtWithDescription
variables.defaultValue: Mention the tools you used to build this project

functions.name: Contributing
functions.description: A section to describe how to contribute to the project

variables.label: Contributing Description
variables.name: contributingDescription
variables.defaultValue:
Please read [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details on our code
of conduct, and the process for submitting pull requests to us.

functions.name: Versioning
functions.description: A section to describe the versioning of the project

variables.label: Versioning Description
variables.name: versioningDescription
variables.defaultValue:
We use [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/) for versioning. For the versions
available, see the [tags on this
repository](https://github.com/PurpleBooth/a-good-readme-template/tags).

functions.name: Authors
functions.description: A section to describe the authors of the project

variables.label: Authors Description
variables.name: authorsDescription
variables.defaultValue:
See also the list of
[contributors](https://github.com/PurpleBooth/a-good-readme-template/contributors)
who participated in this project.

functions.name: License
functions.description: A section to describe the license of the project

variables.label: License Description
variables.name: licenseDescription
variables.defaultValue:
This project is licensed under the [CC0 1.0 Universal](LICENSE.md)
Creative Commons License - see the [LICENSE.md](LICENSE.md) file for
details

functions.name: Acknowledgments
functions.description: A section to describe the acknowledgments of the project

variables.label: Acknowledgments Description
variables.name: acknowledgmentsDescription
variables.defaultValue:
- Hat tip to anyone whose code is used
- Inspiration
- etc
